title: A1286 820-2915-A image problems
message:
Hi,

I have a macbook A1286 820-2915-A with vertical stripes on the screen and a grey image, internal and external.

After disabling the GPU with medusa, and removing R8900, the mac keeps rebooting and don''t power on.

Is it CPU?

Can you help?

title: A1286 820-2915-A image problems
message:
R8900, why?
R8904/11 are the resistors from power rails...

title: A1286 820-2915-A image problems
message:
My mistake.

Now, with  R8900  resoldered again, it is still rebooting. I think I have a corrupetd BIOS now (medusa is asking if Mac ROM is empty, but can read some information, and says that the stored BIOS is identical).

Do you have a CLEAN ME for this model please?

title: A1286 820-2915-A image problems
message:
Youy must do again Medusa mod on the BIOS.
R8904/11 must be removed BEFORE applying power.

title: A1286 820-2915-A image problems
message:
Hi,

It worked, but now on the loading bar, the Mac stops before ending. 

Any idea?

title: A1286 820-2915-A image problems
message:
Test in safe mode.

Try known good BIOS (clean ME).

title: A1286 820-2915-A image problems
message:
Hi,

Do you have a clean ME BIOS for this model?
